name: weather.get_forecast
description: Get a weather forcast for the next several days. Note: only up-to 21 days is supported, should be at least 1 (1 day ahead)

days.description: The amount of days ahead to get the forecast for (1..21, both ends inclusive)

location.description: What location to get the forecast for (current by default) (default: ${CURRENT_LOCATION})
What location to get the weather for (current by default) (default: ${CURRENT_LOCATION})
